study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The evolution of the skills acquired by those who had taken part in the training was considered positive... It was reflected in the increased dynamics in the Cariri territory, notably with: -novel or experimental projects set up by the students on their farms and in their communities; -stronger participation of former students within community associations
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: A thesis was written to assess the UniCampo experiment and its contributions to territorial development

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: Based on organizational learning theories (Argyris and Sch√∂n 1996), the analysis showed that the learning processes developed during training made it possible to bring out common values between the students

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: From the outset, the UniCampo training project had an experimental pilot status
evidence_citations.country_citation: The UniCampo Pilot Project in Brazil
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: This makes it possible to develop new agricultural practices and deliberate on matters that are of interest to family farmers
